attributes.action: request major companies to give military discount.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many countries including our neighbour the US. The military personnel who serve to protect and risk their lives in the name of peacekeeping, are rewarded with basic benefits. 
well in this country i believe it is about time that major organizations make changes and also provide such benefits. I believe that with the signatures of many people and the support of the PM, these changes would be made.
We need to appreciate the people who make a difference more...
